dict.string:
export RUBYLIB="$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT/RubyMate${RUBYLIB:+:$RUBYLIB}" export TM_RUBY=$(which "${TM_RUBY:-ruby}") . "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/lib/webpreview.sh" html_header "Running ‘${TM_FILENAME:-untitled}’" "Perl" echo '
'

"${TM_RUBY}" -- "$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT/run_script.rb"

echo '
' html_footer
